name: MONEI Payments Demo
description: Sample store accepting card payments on the web with MONEI Components and Payments API.

MONEI_ACCOUNT_ID.description: Your MONEI Account ID. Find it here in your Dashboard: https://dashboard.monei.net/settings/api

MONEI_API_KEY.description: Your MONEI API Key. Find it here in your Dashboard: https://dashboard.monei.net/settings/api

MIN_PRICE.description: Minimum price of the random product in cents

MAX_PRICE.description: Maximum price of the random product in cents
